document_data.name: Kura
document_data.mainbody: '''Kura''' was a [[Wa-an dictionary#K|''kobun'']] of the [[Big Head]] [[yakuza]] gang in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: After an attack by [[Black Mist]] yakuza on a shrine protected by Big Heads, Kura gathered around thirty like-minded yakuza to attack the Black Mist headquarters in revenge (an attack that would probably end in tragedy).
document_data.Personality: Kura was a hot-head with a charming and magnetic personality. Despite being very rash, his eloquence often convinced others to join him.
